alert.note: Alert for Butler; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 8:10PM CDT until June 16 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Butler County in south central Alabama... Southeastern Wilcox County in south central Alabama... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 810 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Camden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pine Apple. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
